conference_notes:
• The privacy community and the FOI community are fighting for the same cause: fairness and equality.
  • Privacy is an exception of freedom of information.
  • Right to information is connected to general trust in the public administration.
  • Privacy is not only an individual value. As it is important for our democratic system, it is also a public value.
name: Balancing Openness and Privacy
info:
In this session the balance between privacy and openness was discussed, from the point of view of both privacy and openness activists represented in the panel. There are three main challenges faced at the intersection of privacy and openness. 

Ms. Julia Manske introduced the session underlining that it is necessary to bridge the gap between the privacy community and the FOI community as they are fighting for the same cause: fairness and equality.
